city.name: Barcelona
city.description:
Barcelona is the capital of Catalonia and the second largest city in Spain

A total of 1,656,725 people live in this city, which is bathed by the Mediterranean Sea and inextricably linked to modernist architecture and the work of Gaud√≠.

phrases.englishPhrase: This means 'Better be right or you are dead'

historicalPlaces.description-Alberton: In 1904, the land was sold for the sum of 20,000 pounds, and the new town of Alberton was founded. Alberton was officially established as a township in 1909.

historicalPlaces.description-kdf: South Africa's Kimberley diamond fields, along with discoveries in Gauteng, the Free State, and the Atlantic coast, made it the world's leading gem-quality diamond producer by the mid-20th century.

historicalPlaces.description-isa: On January 22, 1879, about 20,000 Zulu warriors under King Cetshwayo ambushed and defeated a British camp at the Battle of Isandlwana.

favouriteSubjects.description-love: True love fosters a connection that goes beyond the superficial. It's a bond that often involves understanding each other's core values, beliefs, and life goals.

favouriteSubjects.description-psychology: What is human psychology? Human psychology is the study of the mind and human behavior.

favouriteSubjects.description-Death: More specifically, death occurs when a living entity experiences irreversible cessation of all functioning.
